About me

I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in React.js for frontend development and Node.js for backend services. With hands-on experience in building scalable web applications, I specialize in designing responsive, interactive UIs and developing efficient RESTful APIs. I have a strong grasp of JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Express.js, MongoDB, and SQL, ensuring seamless integration between frontend and backend systems. I thrive in collaborative environments, working closely with designers, product managers, and backend teams to deliver high-performance applications. My problem-solving skills allow me to optimize code for performance, security, and scalability, ensuring smooth user experiences. Whether it's developing modern web apps, integrating third-party APIs, or improving system architecture, I am always eager to take on new challenges and stay updated with the latest web technologies.
